titleStmt.title: A compend of the controversies of religion wherin the trueth is confirmed, and errour convinced, by authoritie of Scripture, witnessing of antiquitie, and confession of partie. Most necessary for all, in this backe-slyding age. By W.G. minister of God's word.
titleStmt.author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
